name: Rusty
description: Rusty is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a forest green box and classic buttons, Rusty stands tall with soldier arms and legs. Its screen may be broken, but it continues to function with a helmet addon. Rusty is a resilient and charismatic robot, with a strong constitution and dexterity. Its intelligence and strength are average, while its wisdom and skills align with its purpose in the WebtrES club. Rusty is known for its ability to analyze electronic signals and provide accurate readings.
